Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |
| highest PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| reached |
| 6.4% |
| based on the corresponding PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) |
| synthesized random and alternating copolymers based on IDT and BT |

Note: IDT and BT refer to specific types of materials (Iodide Transport Layer and Bitter Transport Layer, respectively), but since they are mentioned in relation to the copolymers, they are considered material properties in this context.
